trans-unit.source: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: How to make a phone call from Twilio (PHP) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to make a phone call and send a SMS message with the Twilio API service on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Samples are for PHP application.
trans-unit.target: Samples are for PHP application.

trans-unit.source: How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure
trans-unit.target: How to Make a Phone Call Using Twilio in a PHP Application on Azure

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a PHP web page hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows you how you can use Twilio to make a call from a PHP web page hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.
trans-unit.target: The resulting application will prompt the user for phone call values, as shown in the following screen shot.

trans-unit.source: Azure Call Form Using Twilio and PHP
trans-unit.target: Azure Call Form Using Twilio and PHP

trans-unit.source: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:
trans-unit.target: You'll need to do the following to use the code in this topic:

trans-unit.source: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Acquire a Twilio account and authentication token.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].
trans-unit.target: To get started with Twilio, evaluate pricing at [http://www.twilio.com/pricing][twilio_pricing].

trans-unit.source: You can sign up for a trial account at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].
trans-unit.target: You can sign up for a trial account at [https://www.twilio.com/try-twilio][try_twilio].

trans-unit.source: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/api][twilio_api].
trans-unit.target: For information about the API provided by Twilio, see [http://www.twilio.com/api][twilio_api].

trans-unit.source: Obtain the Twilio library for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Obtain the Twilio library for PHP.

trans-unit.source: You can download it from GitHub ([https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php][twilio_php_github]) or install it as a PEAR package.
trans-unit.target: You can download it from GitHub ([https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php][twilio_php_github]) or install it as a PEAR package.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md][twilio_github_readme].
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [https://github.com/twilio/twilio-php/blob/master/README.md][twilio_github_readme].

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure SDK for PHP.
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure SDK for PHP.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of the SDK and instructions on installing it, see [Set up the Azure SDK for PHP][setup_php_sdk].
trans-unit.target: For an overview of the SDK and instructions on installing it, see [Set up the Azure SDK for PHP][setup_php_sdk].

trans-unit.source: Create a web form for making a call
trans-unit.target: Create a web form for making a call

trans-unit.source: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (**callform.html**) that retrieves user data for making a call:
trans-unit.target: The following HTML code shows how to build a web page (**callform.html**) that retrieves user data for making a call:

trans-unit.source: Create the code to make the call
trans-unit.target: Create the code to make the call

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to build a web page (**makecall.php**) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by **callform.html**.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to build a web page (**makecall.php**) which is called when the user submits the form displayed by **callform.html**.

trans-unit.source: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.
trans-unit.target: The code shown below creates the call message and generates the call.

trans-unit.source: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **$sid** and **$token** in the code below.)
trans-unit.target: (Use your Twilio account and authentication token instead of the placeholder values assigned to **$sid** and **$token** in the code below.)

trans-unit.source: In addition to making the call, **makecall.php** displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).
trans-unit.target: In addition to making the call, **makecall.php** displays some call metadata (example shown in screenshot below).

trans-unit.source: For more information about call metadata, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties][twilio_call_properties].
trans-unit.target: For more information about call metadata, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs/api/rest/call#instance-properties][twilio_call_properties].

trans-unit.source: Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP
trans-unit.target: Azure Call Response Using Twilio and PHP

trans-unit.source: Run the application
trans-unit.target: Run the application

trans-unit.source: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.
trans-unit.target: The next step is to deploy your application to Azure Websites.

trans-unit.source: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):
trans-unit.target: The following articles contain the information for creating a website and deploying your code with Git, FTP, or WebMatrix (though not all information in each article is relevant):

trans-unit.target: Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and deploy using Git

trans-unit.target: Create a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site and Deploy Using FTP

trans-unit.target: Create and deploy a PHP-MySQL Azure Web Site using WebMatrix

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.
trans-unit.target: This code was provided to show you basic functionality using Twilio in PHP on Azure.

trans-unit.source: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying to Azure in production, you may want to add more error handling or other features.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.
trans-unit.target: Instead of using a web form, you could use Azure storage blobs or SQL Database to store phone numbers and call text.

trans-unit.source: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see [Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications][howto_blob_storage_php].
trans-unit.target: For information about using Azure storage blobs in PHP, see [Using Azure Storage with PHP Applications][howto_blob_storage_php].

trans-unit.source: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see [Using SQL Database with PHP Applications][howto_sql_azure_php].
trans-unit.target: For information about using SQL Database in PHP, see [Using SQL Database with PHP Applications][howto_sql_azure_php].

trans-unit.source: The **makecall.php** code uses Twilio-provided URL ([http://twimlets.com/message][twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call.
trans-unit.target: The **makecall.php** code uses Twilio-provided URL ([http://twimlets.com/message][twimlet_message_url]) to provide a Twilio Markup Language (TwiML) response that informs Twilio how to proceed with the call.

trans-unit.source: For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a `<Say>` verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient.
trans-unit.target: For example, the TwiML that is returned can contain a `<Say>` verb that results in text being spoken to the call recipient.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see [How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in PHP][howto_twilio_voice_sms_php].
trans-unit.target: Instead of using the Twilio-provided URL, you could build your own service to respond to Twilio's request; for more information, see [How to Use Twilio for Voice and SMS Capabilities in PHP][howto_twilio_voice_sms_php].

trans-unit.source: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml], and more information about `<Say>` and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].
trans-unit.target: More information about TwiML can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml][twiml], and more information about `<Say>` and other Twilio verbs can be found at [http://www.twilio.com/docs/api/twiml/say][twilio_say].

trans-unit.source: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].
trans-unit.target: Read the Twilio security guidelines at [https://www.twilio.com/docs/security][twilio_docs_security].

trans-unit.source: For additional information about Twilio, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
trans-unit.target: For additional information about Twilio, see [https://www.twilio.com/docs][twilio_docs].
